body#1: Welcome to shanovina.com. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is secure. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
body#2#a: Personal information: name, address, phone number, email.
body#2#b: Payment information: credit card details or other payment methods.
body#2#c: Transaction information: purchase history, products purchased.
body#2#d: Technical information: IP address, browser type, operating system.
body#3#b: Providing customer service and technical support.
body#3#c: Sending updates about products, promotions, and events.
body#4: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with trusted partners to perform services related to your order, such as shipping services.
body#5: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, loss, or disclosure. However, no method of data transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure.
body#6: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information that we store. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us via email: support@shanovina.com.
body#7: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on our website and will take effect immediately upon posting.
body#8: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us via email: admin@shanovina.com.
